mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, phone, birthday, type FROM users
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, birthday = #{birthday}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(id, pw, name, phone, email, birthday, type, idx) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{type}, (select ifnull(max(u.idx),0)+1 from users u))
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, birthday = #{birthday}, type = #{type}, icon_num = #{icon_num} WHERE id = #{id}
